attributes.action: Stop the closure of the accident and emergancy in Worthing Hospital
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sign this petition to stop the planned closure of Worthing Hospital's Accident and emergancy.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop the closure of the accident and emergancy in Worthing Hospital."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14661.asp

Prime Minister's Office
